text: This can be reproduced by simply adding a scoped test element (e.g. a Response Assertion) to a sampler, where "Appy to: JMeter Variable" is selected and a variable name is entered. If now in a different or even in the same sampler a new scoped test element of the same type is created, the field "JMeter Variable" is now filled with the data that was entered in the first scoped test element.
creator: etudenhoefner@googlemail.com
etudenhoefner@googlemail.com
text: https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=51488 proposes a way of how this issue can be solved.

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
I mark this bug as duplicate to Bug 51488. Go to this bug to follow the patch
